markdownRemark.html:
Structure the day that places importance on the aspects that are truly most important. Make that apparent in daily life to self and others.

Itâ€™s easy to get caught up in the details and be sidetracked by others. Make it easier with a better structure to each day that emphasizes importance in the right places.

frontmatter.title: Demonstrate what's important
